titleStmt.title: A banquetting-house full of spiritual delights: or, Hymns and spiritual songs on several occasions Century. I. By Elias Keach, minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Keach, Elias.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Benja. Harris for the author,

notesStmt.note: Not the same work as that with a similar title by Benjamin Keach.
